<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we inserted a long previous hint, push this one forwards, and add</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// an extra space to show that this is not part of the previous</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// completion. This is sort of the best we can do when two hints appear</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to overlap.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that if this hint is located immediately after the previous</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// hint, no space will be added, since the location is more important.</span></CodeLine>
